item.title: Conversation topics
item.description: Conversation topics What do you do to make you feel important? - [[how to make friends and influence people ]] FORD

item.title: friends
item.description: Status: #idea Tags: #social Friends Why? Happiness Self-steam Life worth Fun Ideas We make friends sharing common time together; this is especially notable on [[school and university]] when you are locked to similar schedules with more people

item.title: how to make friends
item.description: status: #idea tags: #social How to make friends A friendship can develop weeks after you meet someone but takes a few months to become a [[close friend]]

item.title: Why we don't have friends
item.description: status: #idea tags: #social Why we don’t have friends Don’t prioritise them Lack of attention (Distraction) - [[Rebalance what you spend your life doing]] Commitment References How to make friends
